subject: Football
Drunken and Reckless Driving
lead_paragraph: The former Cowboys player Josh Brent, who was convicted Wednesday of intoxication manslaughter, was sentenced to 180 days in jail and 10 years’ probation.
snippet: The former Cowboys player Josh Brent, who was convicted Wednesday of intoxication manslaughter, was sentenced to 180 days in jail and 10 years’ probation.
